name: TheVoiceFirstChannel
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hear short snippets (1-2 minutes) from experts and practitioners in the field of voice first talk about who they are and what they do. 

If you are passionate about Voice First (podcasting, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Siri, etc.), please feel free to share your thoughts, tips, insights, suggestions, ideas, or whatever Voice First musings you may wish to share, by going to this page: https://www.witlingo.com/voicefirst/

This Flash Briefing was deployed and is being hosted by Witlingo.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
